name: Troll Doodle Run
description:
Troll doodle run is an endless runner where you have to avoid obstacles with your character doodle troll face. Have you ever sat in school, bored out of your mind and doodling in your notebook? Well stop doodling in that book and start playing Doodle troll run!

How to play:
Tap on the screen with your finger to make a single jump or hold it on the screen to make a continuous jump.Try to avoid obstacles as long as you can.

Like Troll doodle run? Give it a rate and a review.
